data.subject: The Wonderful World Of Christmas
data.lyric:
The wonderful world of Christmas
 Is a wonderful world to behold
 The wonderful world of Christmas

data.subject: If Every Day Was Like Christmas
data.lyric:
I hear the bells
 Saying christmas is near
 They ring out to tell the world
 That this is the season

data.subject: The First Noel
data.lyric:
The first noel the angels did sing
 Was to certain poor shepherds
 In fields as they lay
 In fields

Oh well, I'm tired and so weary
 But I must go alone
 Till the lord comes and calls, calls me away,

data.lyric:

 I'll be so blue thinking about you
